nodes.text: Rodius Tharn was a Rodian male and Rebel soldier during the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin,Rodius Tharn was stationed on the planet Tatooine. Circa 1 ABY, Tharn needed to collect important Imperial documents from a spy named Kormund Thrylle. However, the Rodian, who was almost arrested, needed help finding Kormund. Fortunately, Kormund tasked a spacer with finding Rodius. Despite the intervention of the Tatooine militia, the spacer escorted Rodius safely to Bestine, where Kormund was stationed.
